front.title: Communication between the Path Computation Element (PCE) and Management Plane (MP) Based on Mobile Agent (MA)

abstract.t: We propose an interaction scheme using Mobile Agent (MA) between the Path Computation Element (PCE) and Management Plane (MP) to solve information collection delay and management message congestion. It is a new collaboration mechanism about MP in intelligent optical networks. This mechanism also specifies a flexible communication mode between MP and PCE.
